body:
He's so CCCCCCUUUUUUUUTTTTTTTTTTEEEEEEE!! I wish I could look as cute as he does:(
Also too bad that the story went the way that it did. I was hoping for something sweet.

Make it "100mg" and the Author would have been OD.| Would have been a fine Loli story but oh well, just have to stick a dick on it and reverse the gender for the plot. Just like those Desperated Attention Whores on the Net that so badly wanted "any Trending privilege" that they'd mentally "sex change" them into some Imaginary Sex of their choice and then call it a "since i was borned" and "its not a mental disorder".
One of the best shota I’ve seen god bless

I love shotas but this absolutely disgusting; knowing that guy gave his friend a job when he needed it the most and trusted him to insure his brother a good education and all his friend did was take advantage of his little brother's ignorance and innocence to have sex with him.
Nooo. Fuck this. I would have murdered my friend for touching my little brother. Especially if I gave him a home when he was in a tough spot
I wanna fuck that lil boi
Damn so we're just supposed to take that cliffhanger ending. Give the brother his happy ending too.

You come home after a long day. Your work isn't particularly  hard, but you're still tired after the day. You go to your little brother's room. Sure he's a little spoiled, but you love him nonetheless. You recently asked your friend to tutor him after he was kicked out. Your friend was smart in school, and is currently an author, so you trust him to insure Kana is as smart as he can be, even without going to school. You walk into your little brother's room to find him ass naked, with your friends semen oozing out of his asshole. You kill yourself on the spot. The End.
will we ever get a sequel?
Oof he is so fucking cute
So cute but uyyy that dude is gonna get his ass kicked
